title: Hello World
code:
# This is a simple Python program to print 'Hello, World!'
print('Hello, World!')

title: Sum of Two Numbers
code:
# This program calculates the sum of two numbers and prints the result
a = 1 # First number
b = 2 # Second number
sum = a + b # Sum of the two numbers
print(f'The sum of {a} and {b} is {sum}')

title: Factorial using Recursion
Average of Three Numbers
code:
# This program calculates the average of three numbers
num1 = 5.5
num2 = 10.5
num3 = 20.0
average = (num1 + num2 + num3) / 3
print(f'The average of {num1}, {num2}, and {num3} is {average}')

title: Check Even or Odd
Simple Calculator
Array Initialization and Display
code:
# This program initializes a list and displays its elements
arr = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
for i in range(len(arr)):
    print(f'Element at index {i}: {arr[i]}')

title: Reverse a String
code:
# This program reverses a given string
str = input('Enter a string: ')
reversed_str = str[::-1]
print(f'Reversed string: {reversed_str}')

title: Find Largest Element in List
code:
# This program finds the largest element in a list
arr = [10, 20, 30, 40, 50]
max_element = max(arr)
print(f'The largest element in the list is {max_element}')

title: Swap Two Numbers
code:
# This program swaps two numbers
a = 5
b = 10
print(f'Before swapping: a = {a}, b = {b}')
a, b = b, a
print(f'After swapping: a = {a}, b = {b}')
